title: log_prob returns positive values for small cov
body_html:
Issue description

Log prob returns positive value for small covariance matrix.
Is it a bug or I did something wrong ?

Code example


mu = torch.Tensor([-0.4855,  6.7255,  2.6253,  1.1761,  1.5928])
cov = torch.Tensor(
       [[ 5.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000],
        [ 0.0000,  5.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000],
        [ 0.0000,  0.0000,  5.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000],
        [ 0.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000,  5.0000,  0.0000],
        [ 0.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000,  0.0000,  5.0000]]) * 0.001

x = torch.Tensor([-0.6090,  6.8870,  2.6622,  1.2581,  1.6615])

p = torch.distributions.MultivariateNormal(loc=mu,
                                          covariance_matrix=cov)

print(p.log_prob(x)) // tensor(3.2371)
